T02TD1334E:303a-1: shr'i ma h'a dzny'a na d'a ki shva ra s'a dha nam no pi ka / bod skad du /
T02TD1334E:303a-2: dpal chen po ye shes mkha' 'gro'i dbang phyug gi sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02TD1334E:303a-3: dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1334E:303a-4: srid dang mya ngan 'das na bzhugs //
T02TD1334E:303a-5: srid dang mya ngan 'das dang bral //
T02TD1334E:303a-6: bzhugs dang bral las rnam grol ba //
T02TD1334E:303a-7: brjod du med pa la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1334E:303a-8: dpal ldan thig le'i rgyud dbang po //
T02TD1334E:303a-9: rgyud kun gyi ni mnga' bdag che //
T02TD1334E:303a-10: gang gi drin gyis rnyed sla ba //
T02TD1334E:303a-11: bla ma'i zhal snga bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1334E:303a-12: rgyud 'di yi ni rgyal po yis //
T02TD1334E:303a-13: skal ldan rnams ni 'grub don du //
T02TD1334E:303a-14: rgyud kyi bskyed pa'i rim pa yi //
T02TD1334E:303a-15: mdor bsdus sgrub thabs bdag gis bshad //
T02TD1334E:303a-16: dri med chu yis bskor ba yi //
T02TD1334E:303a-17: ne'u sing 'jam mo dang ldan pa //
T02TD1334E:303a-18: me tog 'bras shing yod pa yi //
T02TD1334E:303b-0: der gnas @303b he ru ka mnyes bya //
T02TD1334E:303b-1: dang po rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis //
T02TD1334E:303b-2: 'di ltar bur ni rab bsgom bya //
T02TD1334E:303b-3: lte ba'i rtsa bar yam yig 'bru //
T02TD1334E:303b-4: yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1334E:303b-5: de yi steng du ram yig 'bru //
T02TD1334E:303b-6: ram las me yi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1334E:303b-7: de gnyis yongs su gyur pa yis //
T02TD1334E:303b-8: 'bar ba'i me ni yang dag bsgom //
T02TD1334E:303b-9: rtog pa'i bdag nyid lus po kun //
T02TD1334E:303b-10: me de yis ni sreg par byed //
T02TD1334E:303b-11: bde 'khor bdud rtsi yod pa dang //
T02TD1334E:303b-12: 'od du zhu ba'i gzugs bsgom bya //
T02TD1334E:303b-14: bsregs pa'i lus po gso bar bya //
T02TD1334E:303b-15: dngos po kun gyi ngo bo nyid //
T02TD1334E:303b-16: dbang po'i gzhu dang mtshungs par blta //
T02TD1334E:303b-17: gzugs kyi phung po'i bdag nyid ni //
T02TD1334E:303b-18: 'gro pa kun la khyab pa yin //
T02TD1334E:303b-19: de ni gti mug yin pa'i phyir //
T02TD1334E:303b-20: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad bdag / tshor ba'ang de bzhin kun la khyab //
T02TD1334E:303b-21: rin chen 'byung ldan nga rgyal phyir //
T02TD1334E:303b-23: snang ba mtha' yas chags pa'i phyir //
T02TD1334E:303b-25: don yod grub pa phrag dog phyir //
T02TD1334E:303b-26: rnam par shes pas 'gro kun khyab //
T02TD1334E:303b-27: mi bskyod pa ni zhe sdang phyir //
T02TD1334E:303b-28: de bzhin gshegs kun gzugs su ni //
T02TD1334E:303b-29: he ru ka dpal bdag nyid bzhugs //
T02TD1334E:303b-30: mig dang rna ba sna dang ni //
T02TD1334E:303b-31: lce dang lus dang de bzhin yid //
T02TD1334E:303b-32: rang rang gi ni rang 'od can //
T02TD1334E:303b-33: shes rab dbang po dag pa yin //
T02TD1334E:303b-34: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung //
T02TD1334E:303b-35: m'a ma k'i sogs khams yin no //
T02TD1334E:303b-36: legs dgyes dbang mo rnal 'byor ma //
T02TD1334E:303b-37: nam mkha'i khams su shes par bya //
T02TD1334E:303b-38: de kun gyi ni ngo bo bdag / yin par 'di dag dpyad par bya //
T02TD1334E:303b-39: chos 'di kun gyi rang ngo bos //
T02TD1334E:303b-40: bdag med ma skyes pa yin no //
T02TD1334E:303b-41: de dag 'khrul pas mig yor ni //
T02TD1334E:303b-42: smig rgyu chu zla ji bzhin ni //
T02TD1334E:303b-43: byang chub kyi ni tshogs bsgom pas //
T02TD1334E:303b-44: sems tsam nyid la rab gnas shing //
T02TD1334E:303b-45: de nas rang snying mkha' pad du //
T02TD1334E:303b-46: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
T02TD1334E:303b-47: sems kyi sa bon de dbus su //
T02TD1334E:303b-49: de yi snang bas mdun du ni //
T02TD1334E:303b-50: nam mkhar gser gyi padmo che //
T02TD1334E:303b-53: 'dab mar sangs rgyas byang chub sems //
T02TD1334E:303b-54: chos kyi phyag rgya 'dzin pa'i mchog /
T02TD1334E:304a-0: @304a * // dbus su rdo rje sems dpa' ni //
T02TD1334E:304a-1: ye shes sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid //
T02TD1334E:304a-2: nam mkha' khyab par mthong nas su //
T02TD1334E:304a-3: mchod pa byas nas skyabs su 'gro //
T02TD1334E:304a-4: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1334E:304a-5: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags //
T02TD1334E:304a-6: 'gro ba'i dge ba la rjes yi rang //
T02TD1334E:304a-7: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
T02TD1334E:304a-8: sangs rgyas chos dang 'dus gtso la //
T02TD1334E:304a-9: byang chub thob par skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1334E:304a-10: rang dang gzhan ni 'grub don du //
T02TD1334E:304a-11: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do //
T02TD1334E:304a-12: byang chub sems mchog 'byung byas nas //
T02TD1334E:304a-13: sems can thams cad mgron du gnyer //
T02TD1334E:304a-14: 'gro ba kun la phan don du //
T02TD1334E:304a-15: bdag ni sangs rgyas thob bya'i phyir //
T02TD1334E:304a-16: dgyes mchog byang chub spyad par bgyi //
T02TD1334E:304a-17: de nas tshangs pa yi ni gnas //
T02TD1334E:304a-18: byams pa la sogs ldan bsgom bya //
T02TD1334E:304a-19: bu gcig pa yi ma lta bur //
T02TD1334E:304a-20: brtse ba'i sems kyis mthong ba yin //
T02TD1334E:304a-21: de bzhin sems can thams cad la //
T02TD1334E:304a-22: sems bgyid de ni byams pa'o //
T02TD1334E:304a-23: gang gis thabs kyi sems can 'di //
T02TD1334E:304a-24: sdug bsngal me las bdag gis gdon //
T02TD1334E:304a-25: de lta bur ni gang zhig sems //
T02TD1334E:304a-26: de ni snying rjer bstan pa'o //
T02TD1334E:304a-27: sdug bsngal me las bton pa yis //
T02TD1334E:304a-28: rang gi yid ni dga' ba yin //
T02TD1334E:304a-29: bdag gis sems can phan don byas //
T02TD1334E:304a-30: de ni dga' bar bshad pa'o //
T02TD1334E:304a-31: gdul dka' 'dul ba'i sems can rnams //
T02TD1334E:304a-32: de la zhe sdang bskyed mi bya //
T02TD1334E:304a-33: btang snyoms kyang ni mi bya ste //
T02TD1334E:304a-34: sems can nang na yod phyir ro //
T02TD1334E:304a-35: de lta min na smon lam ni //
T02TD1334E:304a-36: the tshom med par don med 'gyur //
T02TD1334E:304a-37: skyon la btang snyoms ldan pa'i sems //
T02TD1334E:304a-38: de ni btang snyoms mchog yin no //
T02TD1334E:304a-39: de yi bsod nams kyi ni tshogs //
T02TD1334E:304a-41: ye shes tshogs ni 'phel don du //
T02TD1334E:304a-42: stong pa nyid ni bdag nyid yin //
T02TD1334E:304a-44: da ltar byung ba'i 'khor ba gsum //
T02TD1334E:304a-45: ngo bo nyid bral stong pa yin //
T02TD1334E:304a-46: ji ltar nam mkha' de bzhin no //
T02TD1334E:304a-47: aom sva bh'a wa shudda: sarba dharm'a: sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
T02TD1334E:304a-48: aom sva bh'a wa sh'un+ya t'a sarba dharm'a: sva bh'a wa sh'u nya t'a he /
T02TD1334E:304a-49: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1334E:304a-50: de yis ye shes kyi ni tshogs //
T02TD1334E:304b-0: tshogs gnyis po @304b ni rdzogs pa yis //
T02TD1334E:304b-1: the tshom med par byang chub 'thob //
T02TD1334E:304b-2: de nas pam byung padma ni //
T02TD1334E:304b-3: kha dog dmar po 'dab ma brgyad //
T02TD1334E:304b-4: de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni //
T02TD1334E:304b-5: ram las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1334E:304b-6: de yi steng du sa bon h'um //
T02TD1334E:304b-8: de nyid yongs su gyur pa yis //
T02TD1334E:304b-9: skad cig gsum rgyal nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD1334E:304b-10: sku mdog gnag la 'jigs byed che //
T02TD1334E:304b-11: bskal pa'i me bas ngag 'jigs che //
T02TD1334E:304b-12: zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa //
T02TD1334E:304b-13: zhabs bzhi dang ni ldan pa'o //
T02TD1334E:304b-14: zhabs kyis bdud bzhi po ni mnan //
T02TD1334E:304b-15: zhal ni re re spyan gsum ldan //
T02TD1334E:304b-16: rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis bdud phur 'dril //
T02TD1334E:304b-17: gzhan ni ral gri dbyug pa 'dzin //
T02TD1334E:304b-18: de lta bu yi khro rgyal po //
T02TD1334E:304b-19: bdag rang nyid ni bsgom par bya //
T02TD1334E:304b-20: bdag ni sum bha nyid yin phyir //
T02TD1334E:304b-21: de la go cha dgos ma yin //
T02TD1334E:304b-22: aom sum bha ni sum bha h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1334E:304b-23: aom grihna grihna h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1334E:304b-24: aom grihn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ya h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1334E:304b-25: aom a'a na ya ho bha ga w'an badzra bidy'a r'a dza h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1334E:304b-26: shar phyogs la sogs se gol gyis //
T02TD1334E:304b-27: sum bha'i rnam pas sngags gdab bya //
T02TD1334E:304b-28: sna tshogs rdo rje sa yi 'og / h'um las 'od ni spro bar bya //
T02TD1334E:304b-29: de yi 'od kyis snang ba yis //
T02TD1334E:304b-30: rtsig pa dang ni bla re'o //
T02TD1334E:304b-31: rdo rje me lce 'bar ba yin //
T02TD1334E:304b-33: aom gha gha gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya /
T02TD1334E:304b-35: k'i la ya k'i la ya /
T02TD1334E:304b-37: h'um h'um badzra k'i la ya /
T02TD1334E:304b-38: badzra dha r'a dzny'a pa ya ti /
T02TD1334E:304b-39: k'a ya wa ka tsitta badzra k'i la ya h'um phat /
T02TD1334E:304b-40: badzra mungga ra badzra k'i la ya /
T02TD1334E:304b-41: a'a ko ta ya h'um phat /
T02TD1334E:304b-42: de lta'i cho ga'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1334E:304b-43: rdo rje'i gur ni bsam par bya //
T02TD1334E:304b-44: de yi dbus su snyoms pa ni //
T02TD1334E:304b-45: chos kyi dbyings kyi bha ga'i dbyibs //
T02TD1334E:304b-46: rlung la sogs pa'i 'khor lo bzhi //
T02TD1334E:304b-47: de yi nang du bsgom par bya //
T02TD1334E:304b-48: yam gi yig 'bru las byung rlung //
T02TD1334E:304b-49: dkyil 'khor gzhu yi dbyibs lta bu //
T02TD1334E:304b-50: chos kyi dbyings kyi nang du ni //
T02TD1334E:304b-51: nag po rgyal mtshan dang ldan bsgom //
T02TD1334E:304b-52: dam gyi yig 'bru las byung me //
T02TD1334E:304b-53: dkyil 'khor gru gsum kha dog dmar //
T02TD1334E:304b-54: me lce dang ni ldan pa ste //
T02TD1334E:304b-55: rlung gi dkyil 'khor steng du bsgom //
T02TD1334E:304b-56: bam gyi yig 'bru las byung chu //
T02TD1334E:304b-57: dkyil 'khor zlum po'i dbyibs lta bu //
T02TD1334E:304b-58: bum pas mtshan pa kha dog dkar //
T02TD1334E:305a-2: lam gyi yig 'bru las byung sa //
T02TD1334E:305a-3: dkyil 'khor gru bzhi'i dbyibs lta bu //
T02TD1334E:305a-4: rdo rjes mtshan pa kha dog ser //
T02TD1334E:305a-5: chu yi steng du bsgom par bya //
T02TD1334E:305a-6: 'khor bzhi yongs su gyur pa las //
T02TD1334E:305a-7: gzhal yas khang du rab tu bsgyur //
T02TD1334E:305a-8: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02TD1334E:305a-9: rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1334E:305a-10: dra ba dra phyed chun 'phyang dang //
T02TD1334E:305a-11: 'dod yon rin chen la sogs brgyan //
T02TD1334E:305a-12: de yi phyi rol dur khrod bcas //
T02TD1334E:305a-13: phyogs mtshams bye brag brgyad po ru //
T02TD1334E:305a-14: gtum drag de ni tshig pa yin //
T02TD1334E:305a-15: dbyibs can de ni ma tshig pa //
T02TD1334E:305a-16: chang tshing dum bur gyur pa yin //
T02TD1334E:305a-17: 'bar ba dum bur ma gyur pa //
T02TD1334E:305a-18: dmyal sogs 'jigs par bshad pa yin //
T02TD1334E:305a-19: mi bzad pa ni 'jigs par byed //
T02TD1334E:305a-20: ha har dgod ni mdung rtser bskyon //
T02TD1334E:305a-22: pa ta li dang panda li //
T02TD1334E:305a-23: sa le shing dang shi ri sha //
T02TD1334E:305a-24: aa dumw'a ra n+ya gro dha //
T02TD1334E:305a-25: aa shva ta n'a ga gi sar shing //
T02TD1334E:305a-26: dur khrod re re shing re ni //
T02TD1334E:305a-27: dpa' bo sogs kyis dbang du byas //
T02TD1334E:305a-28: bya rog byi la 'ug pa dang //
T02TD1334E:305a-29: stag dang khyi dang bya rgod phag / sha za'i gdong bcas brgyad po ni //
T02TD1334E:305a-30: shing rnams steng na 'dug pa yin //
T02TD1334E:305a-31: bya rog spyang ki 'ug pa dang //
T02TD1334E:305a-32: dpa' bo khyi dang srin po dang //
T02TD1334E:305a-33: phag pa dang ni ro langs dag / rang rang rnam par 'og na gnas //
T02TD1334E:305a-34: de lta bu yi dur khrod kyis //
T02TD1334E:305a-35: gzhan yas khang ni yang dag bskor //
T02TD1334E:305a-37: de yi dbus su bsgom par bya //
T02TD1334E:305a-38: lte ba'i nang du phyag rgya ni //
T02TD1334E:305a-39: gru gsum me tog kunda mtshungs //
T02TD1334E:305a-40: nyi zla a'a li k'a li las //
T02TD1334E:305a-41: rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin can //
T02TD1334E:305a-42: rang gi rig pa dang ldan pa //
T02TD1334E:305a-43: phyag rgya yi ni dkyil du bsgom //
T02TD1334E:305a-44: bde ba chen po 'byung ba ni //
T02TD1334E:305a-45: mchog gi dga' ba'i pho brang las //
T02TD1334E:305a-46: rdo rje ro langs ma ni 'phros //
T02TD1334E:305a-47: de ni dang po'i ro las so //
T02TD1334E:305a-48: gnyis pa'i ro ni 'byung ba las //
T02TD1334E:305a-49: rdo rje dra ba ma ni 'phros //
T02TD1334E:305a-50: gsum pa'i ro ni 'byung ba las //
T02TD1334E:305a-51: rdo rje rtse mo ma ni 'phros //
T02TD1334E:305a-52: bzhi pa'i ro ni 'byung ba las //
T02TD1334E:305a-53: rdo rje zlum po ma ni 'phros //
T02TD1334E:305a-54: gcer bu dang ni skra grol pa //
T02TD1334E:305a-55: shar sgo la sogs shes par bya //
T02TD1334E:305a-56: gnag dang dmar dang ser dang dkar //
T02TD1334E:305b-0: spyan gsum pa dang @305b phyag bzhi pa //
T02TD1334E:305b-1: chu srin nya dang seng ge dang //
T02TD1334E:305b-2: ga ru da ni phyag g-yas bsnams //
T02TD1334E:305b-3: ka p'a la dang kha tv'am ga / sgeg mo yi ni phyag g-yon bsnams //
T02TD1334E:305b-4: gzhan gnyis rdo rje mda' gzhu ni //
T02TD1334E:305b-5: rna ltag tu ni 'gengs par mdzad //
T02TD1334E:305b-6: kun kyang phyag rgya lnga po 'chang //
T02TD1334E:305b-7: sna tshogs pa yi rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02TD1334E:305b-8: 'jigs byed ro yi gdan gnas nas //
T02TD1334E:305b-9: sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa //
T02TD1334E:305b-10: yang na shes rab thabs sbyor bas //
T02TD1334E:305b-11: bde chen rgya mtsho'i pho brang las //
T02TD1334E:305b-12: rdo rje'i ske rags ma ni 'phros //
T02TD1334E:305b-13: de ni lnga pa'i ro las so //
T02TD1334E:305b-14: drug po'i ro yi 'byung ba las //
T02TD1334E:305b-15: rdo rje ser mo ma ni 'phros //
T02TD1334E:305b-16: bdun pa'i ro yi 'byung ba las //
T02TD1334E:305b-17: rdo rje rgod ma ma ni 'phros //
T02TD1334E:305b-18: brgyad pa'i ro yi 'byung ba las //
T02TD1334E:305b-19: rdo rje nyi ma mo ni 'phros //
T02TD1334E:305b-20: bcom ldan 'das ni mnyes byed gnas //
T02TD1334E:305b-21: mtshams ni bzhi po dag na bzhugs //
T02TD1334E:305b-22: rnga dang de bzhin gling bu dang //
T02TD1334E:305b-23: rgyud mdangs dang ni rdza rnga dang //
T02TD1334E:305b-24: rdza rnga chung ngu chal chung dang //
T02TD1334E:305b-25: tam bu ra dang ka ra to //
T02TD1334E:305b-26: de rnams phyag ni gnyis gnyis shes //
T02TD1334E:305b-27: gzugs gnyis pa la 'jig chen ma //
T02TD1334E:305b-28: yang ni shes rab thabs sbyor bas //
T02TD1334E:305b-29: bde ba'i nang gi pad chen las //
T02TD1334E:305b-30: rdo rje legs dgyes ma ni 'phros //
T02TD1334E:305b-31: de ni dang po'i dga' ba las //
T02TD1334E:305b-32: gnyis pa'i dga' ba 'byung ba las //
T02TD1334E:305b-33: rdo rje rgya mtsho ma ni 'phros //
T02TD1334E:305b-34: gsum pa'i dga' ba 'byung ba las //
T02TD1334E:305b-35: rdo rje glang chen ma ni 'phros //
T02TD1334E:305b-36: de dang gnag dang ser dang dmar //
T02TD1334E:305b-37: phyag rgya yi ni grva na bzhugs //
T02TD1334E:305b-38: gur kum ro dang ga pur dang //
T02TD1334E:305b-39: de yis pad snod bkang ba'o //
T02TD1334E:305b-40: g-yas pa yi ni phyag na bsnams //
T02TD1334E:305b-41: kha tv'am ga ni g-yon na'o //
T02TD1334E:305b-42: gru gsum phyag rgya dbu steng du //
T02TD1334E:305b-43: mdzub rtse gnyis ni thur du btsugs //
T02TD1334E:305b-44: g-yon brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs //
T02TD1334E:305b-45: phyag rgya'i dngos grub ster ba'o //
T02TD1334E:305b-46: yang ni shes rab thabs sbyor bas //
T02TD1334E:305b-47: rang bzhin gyis ni dga' ba 'byung //
T02TD1334E:305b-48: rang gi rig ma dang ldan pa //
T02TD1334E:305b-49: rang bzhin las ni nyi 'od zhu //
T02TD1334E:305b-50: de nas smon lam gzhan don du //
T02TD1334E:305b-51: rnal 'byor ma la lha mos zhu //
T02TD1334E:305b-52: bde chen legs dgyes mgon po bzhengs //
T02TD1334E:305b-53: rdo rje legs dgyes bdag dga' mdzod //
T02TD1334E:305b-54: mgon po khyod mi na bdag ro 'dra //
T02TD1334E:306a-1: rje ro yis bdag skye mdzod //
T02TD1334E:306a-2: kye mgon stong pa chad pa'i mtshan //
T02TD1334E:306a-3: rdor mtsho ma bdag dga' bar mdzod //
T02TD1334E:306a-4: padma'i kha phyi rol cig rol //
T02TD1334E:306a-5: mgon po stong pa'i rang bzhin min //
T02TD1334E:306a-6: aa la la la legs dgyes mgon //
T02TD1334E:306a-7: rdo rje glang chen ma dga' mdzod //
T02TD1334E:306a-8: khyod rang gis gsungs bdag min na //
T02TD1334E:306a-10: glu 'di yi ni ngor mdzad nas //
T02TD1334E:306a-12: de las rdo rje gri gug ni //
T02TD1334E:306a-13: yongs su gyur pa las ni nyid //
T02TD1334E:306a-14: dpal chen ye shes mkha' 'gro che //
T02TD1334E:306a-15: lha mo legs dgyes dbang mos 'khyud //
T02TD1334E:306a-16: sems can kun la phan don du //
T02TD1334E:306a-17: snying rje yis ni rngam pa bzhengs //
T02TD1334E:306a-18: sku mdog sprin gyi gnag dang mtshungs //
T02TD1334E:306a-19: zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa //
T02TD1334E:306a-20: zhal ni re re spyan gsum pa //
T02TD1334E:306a-21: zhabs gcig gyen du bsgreng ba ste //
T02TD1334E:306a-22: bdud bzhi yan lag ma dang ldan //
T02TD1334E:306a-23: zhabs gcig gis ni gnon pa yin //
T02TD1334E:306a-24: thod rlon phreng ba'i do shal byas //
T02TD1334E:306a-25: sna tshogs 'od ldan nyi la bzhugs //
T02TD1334E:306a-26: dpa' bo mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan //
T02TD1334E:306a-27: phyag rgya drug gis yan lag brgyan //
T02TD1334E:306a-28: thod pa'i phreng bas dbu la brgyan //
T02TD1334E:306a-29: thor tseg zla ba phyed kyis mtshan //
T02TD1334E:306a-30: sku smad gshin rje'i pags pas dkris //
T02TD1334E:306a-31: gang dgu'i ro dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1334E:306a-32: gnag dang ser dang dmar dang ljang //
T02TD1334E:306a-33: g-yon nas bskor ba'i zhal dang ldan //
T02TD1334E:306a-34: 'khyud pa'i phyag g-yas rdo rje bsnams //
T02TD1334E:306a-35: g-yon pa na ni dril bu'o //
T02TD1334E:306a-36: nyi ma mda' dang ka p'a la //
T02TD1334E:306a-37: khrag gis bkang ba g-yas na bsdams //
T02TD1334E:306a-38: zla ba gzhu dang kha tv'am ga / rdo rjes mtshan pa g-yon na bsnams //
T02TD1334E:306a-39: legs dgyes dbang mo de dang mnyam //
T02TD1334E:306a-40: yang na phyag ni gnyis dang ldan //
T02TD1334E:306a-41: zhal gcig pa dang spyan gsum pa //
T02TD1334E:306a-42: sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o //
T02TD1334E:306a-43: phyag na gri gug snod ni bsnams //
T02TD1334E:306a-44: byin pa gnyis kyis legs 'khyud cing //
T02TD1334E:306a-46: mtshan kun dang ni ldan pa'o //
T02TD1334E:306a-47: skra grol ba dang spyan ring ba //
T02TD1334E:306a-48: sku smad ske rags bar du chad //
T02TD1334E:306a-49: ji ltar sgo sogs rnal 'byor ma //
T02TD1334E:306a-50: brkyang ba la sogs pa yis bzhugs //
T02TD1334E:306a-51: de bzhin gru gsum grvar bzhugs pa //
T02TD1334E:306a-52: sgom pa yis ni shes par bya //
T02TD1334E:306b-0: @306b de lta'i ye shes 'khor lo ni //
T02TD1334E:306b-1: bdag nyid dang ni bcas par bsgom //
T02TD1334E:306b-2: de nas bde ba chen po'i gzhi //
T02TD1334E:306b-3: padma'i snod kyi dbus su ni //
T02TD1334E:306b-4: bdud rtsi lnga yi lha yi mchog / de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag nyid //
T02TD1334E:306b-5: lte ba'i me 'od tsha ba yis //
T02TD1334E:306b-6: bdud rtsi de ni zhu bar bya //
T02TD1334E:306b-7: rdor gsum ye shes sa bon gyis //
T02TD1334E:306b-8: dkar byas dag byas 'bar byas so //
T02TD1334E:306b-9: sngags kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis ni //
T02TD1334E:306b-10: rang gi lce yi 'dab mar gzhag / phyi dang nang gi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1334E:306b-11: lus ni de yis tshim par bya //
T02TD1334E:306b-12: aom yo ga aa mri ta shuddha: sarba dharma yo ga aa mri ta shuddho& ham //
T02TD1334E:306b-13: de nas mgon po'i snying po ni //
T02TD1334E:306b-14: thams cad 'grub don bzlas par bya //
T02TD1334E:306b-15: aom ma h'a kro dhe shva ra dz'a ya we dza yatta tta h'a sa ma h'a ka p'a l'a gne bha ya h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1334E:306b-16: de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po'o //
T02TD1334E:306b-17: aom badzra ti dzu gra hrim hrim phat /
T02TD1334E:306b-19: aom so ra ta sa ma ye shva re h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1334E:306b-21: aom klim blim dzlim phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1334E:306b-23: thog mar aom dang h'um phat mthar //
T02TD1334E:306b-24: bar du ming ni spel bar bya //
T02TD1334E:306b-25: 'khor gyi lha mo thams cad kyi //
T02TD1334E:306b-26: mchod pa'i sngags su dran pa'o //
T02TD1334E:306b-27: sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan pa yis //
T02TD1334E:306b-28: de nas gtor ma gtang bar bya //
T02TD1334E:306b-29: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcangs nas //
T02TD1334E:306b-30: rgyab dang rgyab ni sprad pa'o //
T02TD1334E:306b-31: mthe'u chung lug rgyud rnam pa'i tshul //
T02TD1334E:306b-32: mdzub mo gnyis ni cung zad dgug / rnal 'byor ma rnams thams cad dang //
T02TD1334E:306b-33: mkha' 'gro ma thams cad tshur spyon //
T02TD1334E:306b-34: sha dang nya la sogs pa yi //
T02TD1334E:306b-35: gtor ma 'di long dam tshig bsrungs //
T02TD1334E:306b-36: bdag gi don thams cad la grogs mdzod /
T02TD1334E:306b-37: sgrub thabs 'di la dad pa yod pa de bsrung ba'i don du stsol cig / aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1334E:306b-38: gru gsum phyag rgya steng bzhag ste //
T02TD1334E:306b-39: 'bad pa yis ni gtor ma gtang //
T02TD1334E:306b-40: las rim de dag kun rdzogs nas //
T02TD1334E:306b-41: de sogs rnam par dag par bya //
T02TD1334E:306b-42: dga' ba bzhi ni rab gnas phyir //
T02TD1334E:306b-43: zhal bzhi po ni mdzes pa yin //
T02TD1334E:306b-44: de nyid ye shes gsum dag pas //
T02TD1334E:306b-45: zhal ni so so'i spyan gsum mo //
T02TD1334E:306b-46: srid dang mya ngan 'das gcig pa //
T02TD1334E:306b-47: de bas zhabs gcig gyen du bsgreng //
T02TD1334E:306b-48: pha rol phyin pa drug lam gyis //
T02TD1334E:306b-49: phyag rgya drug pos yan lag brgyan //
T02TD1334E:307a-2: gshin rje'i pags pas sku smad dkris //
T02TD1334E:307a-3: byams pa chen po'i bdag nyid ni //
T02TD1334E:307a-4: de bas sprin gyi mdog dang mtshungs //
T02TD1334E:307a-5: gnyis su med pa'i shes rab thabs //
T02TD1334E:307a-6: de phyir rdo rje dril bu ldan //
T02TD1334E:307a-7: bdud kun bsdigs par byed pa'i phyir //
T02TD1334E:307a-8: mda' dang gzhu ni khengs par 'gengs //
T02TD1334E:307a-9: snang ba dang ni snang ba mched //
T02TD1334E:307a-10: de la bdag rang bdag po yin //
T02TD1334E:307a-11: de bas zla ba nyi ma gnyis //
T02TD1334E:307a-12: rol pa yis ni phyag na bsnams //
T02TD1334E:307a-13: dngos dang dngos min rtog pa med //
T02TD1334E:307a-14: de phyir mgo bo'i padma'i snod //
T02TD1334E:307a-15: chos kun stong pa'i ngo bo nyid //
T02TD1334E:307a-16: de bas kha tv'am ga bsnams pa //
T02TD1334E:307a-17: phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid yin //
T02TD1334E:307a-18: zla ba phyed pas thor cog brgyan //
T02TD1334E:307a-19: nam mkha' ji bzhin ngo bo yis //
T02TD1334E:307a-20: de bas mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan //
T02TD1334E:307a-21: snying rje chen pos rngam pa'i don //
T02TD1334E:307a-22: de phyir yang dag 'jigs pa'i tshul //
T02TD1334E:307a-23: mu stegs rnams la khrel rgod phyir //
T02TD1334E:307a-24: rus pa la sogs pa yis brgyan //
T02TD1334E:307a-25: bdud kun gyis ni mi tshugs pa //
T02TD1334E:307a-26: de bas bdud kyi steng na bzhugs //
T02TD1334E:307a-27: chags pa la sogs spangs pa yis //
T02TD1334E:307a-28: de phyir dur khrod nang du rol //
T02TD1334E:307a-29: de kun dag pa shes pas na //
T02TD1334E:307a-30: da ni ngal bso bya ba'o //
T02TD1334E:307a-31: rang gi snying gar mkha' pad du //
T02TD1334E:307a-32: dri med rgyas pa'i zla ba bsgom //
T02TD1334E:307a-33: de yi dbus su tshul tsam ni //
T02TD1334E:307a-34: mchog gi rnam pa skye med mkha' //
T02TD1334E:307a-35: phra mo'i 'od kyi rang bzhin can //
T02TD1334E:307a-36: rlabs med pa yi rang rig go //
T02TD1334E:307a-37: de nyid bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni //
T02TD1334E:307a-38: myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1334E:307a-39: dngos grub chen po 'dod gyur na //
T02TD1334E:307a-40: de la the tshom mi bya'o //
T02TD1334E:307a-41: gang zhig rgyud kyi nang med pa //
T02TD1334E:307a-42: de ni bdag gi rang bzo min //
T02TD1334E:307a-43: 'di byas bsod nams rnyed pa gang //
T02TD1334E:307a-44: sems can kun gyis thob par shog / dpal ye shes mkha' 'gro'i sgrub thabs /
T02TD1334E:307a-45: slob dpon chen po longs spyod rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1334E:307a-47: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra dzny'a shr'i gupta nyid dang /
T02TD1334E:307a-48: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong rin chen rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
